quotes.text: A successful person is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks that others throw at him or her.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.text: Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: If you wish to be a writer, write.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: To follow, without halt, one aim: There is the secret of success.
quotes.author: Anna Pavlova

quotes.text: The most successful people are those who are good at plan B.
quotes.author: James A. Yorke

quotes.text: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Focusing your life solely on making a buck shows a poverty of ambition. It asks too little of yourself. And it will leave you unfulfilled.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: I never did anything worth doing by accident, nor did any of my inventions come by accident
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The ideals which have lighted my way, and time after time have given me new courage to face life cheerfully, have been Kindness, Beauty, and Truth. The trite subjects of human efforts, possessions, outward success, luxury have always seemed to me contemptible.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: It is impossible to escape the impression that people commonly use false standards of measurement â€” that they seek power, success and wealth for themselves and admire them in others, and that they underestimate what is of true value in life.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.text: Here is one quality that one must possess to win, and that is definiteness of purpose, the knowledge of what one wants, and a burning desire to possess it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: One fails forward toward success.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.text: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.text: Formula for success: under promise and over deliver.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.text: By believing passionately in something that does not yet exist, we create it.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.text: Not every difficult and dangerous thing is suitable for training, but only that which is conducive to success in achieving the object of our effort.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: You might well remember that nothing can bring you success but yourself.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: I can't imagine a person becoming a success who doesn't give this game of life everything he's got.
quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

quotes.text: Of course there is no formula for success except perhaps an unconditional acceptance of life and what it brings.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

quotes.text: It is on our failures that we base a new and different and better success.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.text: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
quotes.author: Bobby Unser

quotes.text: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.text: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

quotes.text: Ask yourself the secret of your success. Listen to your answer and practice it.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: There is only one success: to be able to spend your life in your own way.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.text: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The first requisite for success is the ability to apply your physical and mental energies to one problem incessantly without growing weary.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: I cannot give you the formula for success, but I can give you the formula for failure: which is: Try to please everybody.
quotes.author: Herbert Bayard Swope

quotes.text: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.text: Success in business requires training and discipline and hard work. But if you're not frightened by these things, the opportunities are just as great today as they ever were.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.text: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.
quotes.author: Bob Feller

quotes.text: If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results.
quotes.author: Jack Dixon

quotes.text: Those who are blessed with the most talent don't necessarily outperform everyone else. It's the people with follow-through who excel.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.text: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: That's the risk you take if you change: that people you've been involved with won't like the new you. But other people who do will come along.
quotes.author: Lisa Alther

quotes.text: The art of progress is to preserve order amid change, and to preserve change amid order.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.text: The industrial landscape is already littered with remains of once successful companies that could not adapt their strategic vision to altered conditions of competition.
quotes.author: Ralph Abernathy

quotes.text: Never mistake activity for achievement.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Four steps to achievement: Plan purposefully. Prepare prayerfully. Proceed positively. Pursue persistently.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: The greatest achievement of humanity is not its works of art, science, or technology, but the recognition of its own dysfunction.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
quotes.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quotes.text: Ideas are the beginning points of all fortunes.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: First comes thought; then organization of that thought, into ideas and plans; then transformation of those plans into reality. The beginning, as you will observe, is in your imagination.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: You give before you get.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul; the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Edison failed 10,000 times before he made the electric light. Do not be discouraged if you fail a few times.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: No alibi will save you from accepting the responsibility.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: There are no limitations to the mind except those we acknowledge.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Opportunity often comes disguised in the form of misfortune, or temporary defeat.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: You can do it if you believe you can!
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: The world has the habit of making room for the man whose actions show that he knows where he is going.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Happiness is found in doing, not merely possessing.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Results! Why, man, I have gotten a lot of results. I know several thousand things that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: You were not born a winner, and you were not born a loser. You are what you make yourself be.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.text: No man can succeed in a line of endeavor which he does not like.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: The key to success is failure.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: You already have every characteristic necessary for success if you recognize, claim, develop and use them.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed. It is the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: I believe that potential is unlimited - success depends on daring to act on dreams.
quotes.author: Estee Lauder

quotes.text: Success is a consequence and must not be a goal.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.text: Kind words do not cost much. Yet they accomplish much.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Hell, there are no rules here-- we're trying to accomplish something.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Constant kindness can accomplish much. As the sun makes ice melt, kindness causes misunderstanding, mistrust, and hostility to evaporate.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.text: If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: There are basically two types of people. People who accomplish things, and people who claim to have accomplished things. The first group is less crowded.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: We are not animals. We are not a product of what has happened to us in our past. We have the power of choice.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.text: To be calm is the highest achievement of the self.
quotes.author: Zen Proverb

quotes.text: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: FOCUS - Follow One Course Until Successful
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.text: The first principle of success is desire.
quotes.author: Robert Collier
